utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, the reason why I asked you guys out to brunch today is because I have been doing some thinking about who should be my maid of honor.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! This is it! I really hope it’s you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I hope it’s you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Me too!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: First of all um, I love you both so much and you’re both so important to me…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, bla-bla-bla-bla!! Who is it?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well umm, I was thinking that maybe we could come up with a system where we trade of being maid of honor for each other. Like hypothetically, if Phoebe were mine…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes!!! Oh!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hypothetically!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Still.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: If Phoebe were my maid of honor…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel would be Phoebe’s, I would be Rachel’s, that way we all get to do it once and no one would get upset.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah that’s actually a pretty good idea.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I’ll do that. So who gets to be yours?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well that’s the best part. Umm, you guys get to decide!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wh-why is that the best part?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because then I don’t have to!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well of course we will help you decide! We will do anything we can to help you! Now, I would like to make a toast, to the future Mrs. Chandler Bing , my best friend, and truly one of the nicest people that…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m really not deciding!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Fine!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Excuse me, I-I couldn’t help overhearing, you’re marrying Chandler Bing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah that’s right.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Huh, good luck!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Aww, and good luck to you too! What a nice lady!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Die Hard still great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yep. Hey, what do you say we make it a double feature?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What’d you rent?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Die Hard 2.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey, this is Die Hard 1 again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, well we watch it a second time and its Die Hard 2!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, we just saw it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And it’ll be cool to see it again! Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey and Ross
utterance.content: Die Hard!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude, you didn’t say Die Hard. Is everything okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I just got uh, got plans.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, John McLane had plans!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, see the thing is I want to get out of here before Joey gets all worked up and starts calling everybody bitch.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What are you talking about? Bitch.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, when I get married will you be my maid of honor?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God Phoebe! I mean I’m just—Wait a minute. If I’m your maid of honor that means you are Monica’s.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Well, if that’s what you want…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! No way Phoebe! I want to be Monica’s!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But why does it even matter?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why does it matter so much to you?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Because this one is now! And-and it’s two of our best friends! Who knows what you’re gonna marry!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What-what if I marry Ross—Or Joey?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You wouldn’t! Okay look, Rachel I know you really want to do this, but I-I’ve never been maid of honor to anyone before! And I know you’ve done it at least twice!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah but Phoebe…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And no, oh please, oh please let me finish. Oh I guess that was it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. It’s—since you’ve never done it before you can be Monica’s made of honor.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, thank you so much! Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m gonna marry someone good y’know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh I know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Better than Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What happened?!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I don’t know!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We fell asleep! That is all.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Yep. Yeah. All right, well uh, I’d better go.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think that would be best.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. All right, I’ll talk to you later.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. But not about this!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! Never! Never! Bye.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No touch! No touch!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah hey, a weird thing happened today whey I was at brunch. This woman overheard that I was marrying you and-and then she…she wished me good luck.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s sweet.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, it’s more like a good luck.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So uh, what did this woman look like?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She was like 30, dark hair, attractive.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, is there any chance you were looking into a bright, shiny thing called a mirror?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on, was it somebody maybe you dated in college?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, no I only dated two girls in college, both blonde, both not attractive… Hold on one second; let me check this out. (He gets up and grabs a photo album.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, let’s see… Okay uh, is that her?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God yes! Who is she?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Julie Grath, my camp girlfriend.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Did you break up with her?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, we’re still together. Yeah we went out for two summers, and then I broke up with her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, ‘cause she came back the third summer and she’d gotten really fa-aa-aw-ow…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Fat?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I did not say fat! I said, "Fa-aa-aw-ow…"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You broke up with a girl because she was fat?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah, but it was a really, really long time ago! Does she still feel bad?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, apparently she does.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, you know what they say, elephants never forget. Seriously, good luck marrying me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe is gonna be Monica’s maid of honor!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Well I hope it goes better than the last time you did it for that girl downstairs, remember?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You have been maid of honor before?!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: See? This is exactly why you shouldn’t lie!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right that’s it! I am maid of honor!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Na-uh, I am!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How come you are?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Because I cared enough to lie!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey-hey-hey, I can help you decide who should do it! Yeah, we could have like uh, like an audition and see how you’d handle maid of honor type situations.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are you talking about?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Like when I want a job, I go to an audition and if I’m the best of the people they see, they give me the part.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, so after this audition, who decides who gets it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh uh, me and Ross can be the judges.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, it’s better than us deciding.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, come on! This is crazy! Can’t we just flip a coin?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! Coins hate me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay fine, y’know what? We will let Ross and Joey decide. Hiiiii, Ross! Sweetie.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey there, you handsome thing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow, this cologne really is every bit as good as Georgio.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Just uh, brought back your videos.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh hey look uh Ross, look I think we need to talk about before.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No we don’t!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes we do! Now look, that was the best nap I ever had!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I… I don’t know what you are talking about.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on! Admit it! That was the best nap you ever had!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’ve had better.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay! When?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right! All right! It was the best nap ever!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh-huh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’ve said it! Okay?! But it’s over Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I want to do it again.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We can’t do it again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Because it’s weird!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fine! Do you want something to drink?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure, what do you got?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Warm milk and Excedrin P.M.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler! Chandler! I just figured out who you are!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Can you figure out what I’m doing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You’re Lewis Posin.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Lewis Posin! He was my best friend in fifth grade, and-and then one day I asked him to be my boyfriend and he said no. Do you know why?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because you kept talking to him while he was trying to go to the bathroom?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! But because he thought I was to faaaaa…. And every time I think about it, it makes me feel as bad as I did in fifth grade! Y’know, I-I really think that you should apologize to Julie.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What? Are you kidding? That was like 16 years ago.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, I know. But y’know what? It would make me feel better if Lewis apologized to me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, I will do it. But I have to warn you; this may make me a better person and that is not the man you feel in love with!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, all right, this is how it’s going to work. We’re gonna give you hypothetical maid of honor situations and you will be scored on a scale of 1 to 10, 1 being the highest.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, 10 is the highest.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why is 10 the highest?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Because it’s the highest. Okay, Rachel you’re up first. Situation No. 1: You’re with Monica, the wedding is about to start when Monica gets cold feet. Go!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t want to marry Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, uh…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’ve got cold feet.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: …it’s gonna be okay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, one man for the rest of my life? I don’t know if I can do it! This means I’ll never get to sleep with Joey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Look Monica, getting cold feet is very common. Y’know, it’s-it’s just because of all the anticipation and you just have to remember that you love Chandler. And also, I ran out on a wedding. You don’t get to keep the gifts.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Very good! Drawing on your own experience, I like that!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, very nice Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you judges.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ugh, what a kiss ass.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, Phoebe…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes! Your honor?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We’re now in the ceremony, Monica is about to say, "I do" when her drunk uncle starts yelling. What do you do? Go!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: When Monica was a little girl, I remember that——Ooh!! Ow! Very good!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes! Excellent! Perfect score!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait a minute! She just made a scene in the middle of the ceremony!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! Do you want do you want a little taste of Pheebs?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It is time for you to give your maid of honor speech.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, wait a minute, we haven’t pre…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay! Okay! Umm, Webster’s Dictionary defines marriage as… Okay!! Forget that! That sucks!! Okay, never mind! Forget it! Umm, umm, okay, uh… I met, I-I met, I met Monica when we were just a couple of six year olds and I became friends with Chandler when he was 25, although he seemed like a six year old.

utterance.speaker: Ross and Joey
utterance.content: Oh! That’s nice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you. Thank you very much. Umm, I’ve known them separately and I’ve known them together and-and to know them as a couple is to know that you are truly in the presence of love. So I would like to raise my glass to Monica and Chandler and the beautiful adventure they are about to embark upon together. I can think of no two people better prepared for the journey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow. Good speech.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, it really was!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Aw, thanks!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay Phoebe, I guess you’re next although I really don’t see the point.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, I can’t believe that Monica and Chandler are getting married. I remember talking about this day with Rachel while we were showering together, naked.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And she’s back in the game.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Julie hi! Chandler Bing, I, I guess you remember me.

utterance.speaker: Julie
utterance.content: Hello Skidmark.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s a nickname, I’ll explain later.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s pretty clear.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ah, uh, I owe you a long overdue apology. I never should have broken up with you because you were overweight.

utterance.speaker: Julie
utterance.content: That’s why you broke up with me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You-you-you didn’t know that. Well, I guess my work here is done!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, well first of all I would like to say that you both performed very well. Okay? You should be proud of yourselves. And-and I would also like to say that in this competition there are no losers. Well, except for Rachel—Damnit!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?! I won!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m sorry Rach, it was, it was really close.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well then I demand a recount!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Actually, it wasn’t that close.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Y’know what? No! No! You thing was so stupid anyway, this was ridiculous—We’re gonna flip a coin! All right?! Heads!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: The coins have finally forgiven me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well y’know what? I hope Monica forgives you after you throw her, her vegetarian, voodoo, goddess circley shower!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rach, it’s gonna be okay! You guys are the best!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Boy I tell ya, that judging stuff took a lot out of me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! I was thinking about maybe going upstairs and taking a little nap on my couch.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why-why would I care about that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No reason, I’m just saying that uh… That’s where I’ll be.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: As bad as that went I actually enjoyed myself. I think that I’m going to apologize for all of the stupid things I do.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why don’t you just stop doing stupid things? Then you wouldn’t have to apologize.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I would really love it if could do both.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, I…I have to ask.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you gonna break up with me if I get fat again?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, you broke up with Julie Grath! How much weight could she have gained?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: A hundred and forty-five pounds.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: In one year?! My God what did she eat? Her-her family! That’s not the point.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look I know it was a stupid reason to break up with somebody, but I was 15!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well… That’s not the only time this was an issue. You remember when umm, you spent Thanksgiving with us? You called me fat.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. Okay, now wait a minute that was totally different.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You were not supposed to hear that! I said that behind you back!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What if I have babies, okay? I mean I’m gonna look different. I’m okay with that, but I’m not sure that you are!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look you have to realize I don’t think of you as a thin, beautiful woman. See this is one of things that I can apologize for later! Look, what I mean is you’re Monica! Okay? And I am in love with Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Keep going.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So you can balloon up or you can shrink down and I will still love you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Even if I shrink down to two inches tall?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’d carry you around in my pocket.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I love you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Skidmark’s still got a way with the ladies.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! I just want to apologize. I’m really sorry I was a baby.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s ridiculous Rachel, we were all babies once. Oh, you mean today.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah, and y’know you-you deserve to win. And-and y’know I was thinking about it, if-if you’re Monica’s maid of honor that means I get to be yours.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! Oh, umm when-when Monica and Chandler got engaged I started putting some stuff together, y’know just in case…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh that’s so sweet thanks.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Here is a book of poetry that I know Monica loves. And-and ohh God this is funny, look, this is a picture of one Halloween where she dressed up as a bride. And look, she made me carry her train, which was weird because I was Wonder Woman. Oh and here’s a little purse that I found. Y’know I just thought that maybe they could hold the rings in there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And umm, vintage handkerchiefs y’know ‘cause, people cry at weddings. I’m just gonna grab a couple of these.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This stuff is great!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I forgot this was in here. Umm, this was the uh garter that I was saving for my wedding and I wanted it to be Monica’s something borrowed and it’s blue. Yeah…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y’know Rach, I think that, I think you should be Monica’s made of honor.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You do? Why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Because I think it means more to you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But Pheebs, y’know you earned it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Its fine. I mean, this is something that you’ve been thinking about since you were what, 14?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I was ten. I just developed early.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Man alive!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, what’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, we just decided that Rachel is gonna be your maid of honor.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh, wow! That’s great! Oh wow! We really have to start planning! I have, I have a lot of really specific ideas! We should probably get together like four times per week. You can come over to my place; we’ll get together before work! What do you say, 6:30, my place? I’m so excited!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah okay, you laugh now, but she’s gonna be yours.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Great nap.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It really was.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude! What the hell are you doing?! God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Excuse me.
